description: The IMMUNE_HISTORY table contains the history data for immunizations ordered through the clinical system. It may also contain information on immunizations as reported by the patient, but not ordered/administered via clinical system. This table contains the history of changes made to the information that is found in the IMMUNE table. Fields in this table are no-add related group items in the LPL database.

columns.name: IMMUNE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the immunization record in your system production system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The Line Count for the line in the table which in combination with the IMMUNE_ID forms the primary key for this table.

columns.name: IMM_TYPE_HIST_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique ID of the immunizations (LIM) master file which is associated with this immunization record.  Corresponds to the type of immunization given to this patient.

columns.name: IMM_TYPE_HIST_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the immunization.

columns.name: IMM_HX_PRODUCT
columns.description: Stores the product information associated with this immunization. Products are usually related to the lot number.

columns.name: IMM_HX_NDC_NUM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Medication National Drug Codes (NDC) master file that is associated with this immunization and stores the NDC numbers associated with the administration of this immunization.

columns.name: IMM_HX_NDC_NUM_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_DATE
columns.description: The  date when this immunization was administered.

columns.name: IMM_HX_TIME
columns.description: The time when this immunization was administered.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_DOSE
columns.description: The dosage information for this immunization administered.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the route of the immunization, such as oral, intramuscular, or intradermal.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The location of the injection, if appropriate.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_MFG_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the manufacturer of this vaccine.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_LOT
columns.description: The LOT number for the immunization administered.

columns.name: IMM_HX_NEXT_DUE_DT
columns.description: The date on which the administered immunization is due next.  , if in a series. This is manually established by the user, and not automatically calculated.

columns.name: IMM_HX_EXP_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the immunization administered expires.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_GIVEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user in the EMP master file that is listed in the clinical system as actually administering the  immunization to the patient.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_EXT_AD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the source of verification of external administration of immunization.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient reported


Confirmed


MyChart Entered


Auto Reconciled From Outside Source

columns.name: IMM_HX_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID in the questionnaire answers (HQA) master file that is associated with the immunization administered.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_VIS_DATE
columns.description: The free text date field associated with the immunization where VIS (Vaccine Information Statements) date is stored.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_DEFER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the reason for deferring the immunization, e.g. patient refused, contraindication, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient Refused


Contraindication

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_COMMENT
columns.description: The free text comments associated with the immunization administered.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_ENTRY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user  in the EMP masterfile associated with the person who entered the immunization administration information into the clinical system.

columns.name: PHYSICAL_SITE_HX
columns.description: The physical site information for the immunization administered such as a specific hospital.

columns.name: IMM_HX_HIST_ADMI_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not an immunization is historical or not. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_ENT_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the immunization was entered into the system.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the immunization status. Examples are "Given" if the immunization has been administered, "Deleted" if the immunization has been deleted from the administration history, "Incomplete" if the item has been ordered but not administered and a status of "Deferred" if the immunization has been deferred.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Given


Deleted


Incomplete


Deferred


Refused


Partially Administered


Invalid

columns.name: IMM_HX_MAR_ADMIN_LI
columns.description: The immunization history MAR administration line.

columns.name: IMM_CHRG_REC_HX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID in the Universal Charge Line (UCL) master file that is associated with the immunization administered.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_ENC_CSN
columns.description: This column stores the history information of immunization CSN whenever an edit was made on the Immunization.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_DOSE_AMT
columns.description: The history of dosage amount for the immunization administered.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_HX_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The history of dosage unit for the immunization administered.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMM_HX_DUALSIGN_ID
columns.description: History of the users who performed the second user verification on the immunization

columns.name: IMM_HX_DUALSIGNINST_DTTM
columns.description: History of instant at which the immunization was verified by the second user.

columns.name: IMM_DEL_REASON_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Historic reason for immunization deletion.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMM_HX_SCAN_BARCODE
columns.description: The history of raw data captured during immunization barcode scanning.

columns.name: IMMZTN_HX_ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the date and time that the data in the row was entered. If the exact time is not known, a date may be contained in IMMNZTN_HX_ENT_DATE instead.

columns.name: IMM_HX_PRODUCT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The brand name associated with the vaccination administration in previous edits to the record, stored as a category value from a defined set of products. Historical version of IMM PRODUCT - CATEGORY (I LPL 4007).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IMM_HX_DEFER_DUR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Each category value represents a different time scale of deferral for a vaccine administration deferral (e.g. "brief", "permanent", etc...) that was associated with the vaccine deferral at the time of a previous edit to the record. This item does NOT store the specific length of time the vaccine was deferred. This is the historical version of IMM DEFERRAL DURATION (I LPL 4077).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IMM_HX_MAR_AD_LK_ID
columns.description: Link to the INP record that may hold the administrations data - Historical.

columns.name: IMM_HX_LOT_NUM_ID
columns.description: The history of lot(LOT) record Id for the immunization adminstered.
